name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - F | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I will give you three clues.  The first clue is the longest word, which begins with an F.  If you drop that first letter, the new word is the answer to the second clue.  Drop the first letter again for the third word as an answer to the third clue.  Only type in the first word, though, NOT all three!  For instance, if the clue read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", the answer would be "Drink - Rink - Ink", so you would type in "Drink".  Make sense?  Good.  Here we go!

To cause hunger - Religion of simple living - _ Mash
Difficult task - Consume - Where one might be; e.g. _ the store
Hit lightly - Taste with tongue, as in a lollipop - Fish disease
Excess skin - Scientist's lair - Stomach muscle
Burst of light - Single eye hair - Cinders
Rose or lily - Less high - One in debt
Weak - Wooden or metal bar; e.g. chair _ - To be sick
Person who wears old-fashioned clothes - Bottom - Baseball referee
Nervous worry - Shine - Place in Switzerland
